section.title: tax selections creating new Tax Selection
section.para: To create a new Tax Selection, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Tax Selection, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Tax Authority you want to associate with the Tax Selection.
Specify the Tax Type you want to associate with the Tax Selection.
Specify the Tax Code you want to associate with the Tax Selection.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:
